summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North and Northeast 130th St. from the Central Freeway in the vicinity of 3rd Ave. Northeast to Greenwood Ave. North; by grading, by constructing concrete sidewalks and a multiple-lift surfaced roadway; by constructing storm drains; providing for the necessary surface drainage; all in accordance with Resolution No. 19192 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement by made by special assessments upon property in said payable by the mode of installment notes.
